headline: Decisions Recognized as a Major Contender in Everest Group's Process Mining Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: Decisions, provider of a leading global business process automation platform, has been recognized as a Major Contender in Everest Group's Process Mining Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.

headline: Virtusa Named a Major Contender in Everest Group Life Sciences Digital Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: Virtusa Corporation, a global provider of digital strategy, engineering, and IT services, today announced that it has been named a Major Contender in Everest Group's Life Sciences Digital Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. The report evaluates 35 providers delivering digital services to life sciences enterprises, including biopharmaceutical and medical device companies, based on their ability to enable transformation through scalable, co-innovative solutions and differentiated digital capabi
